mapper.select: select table_name tableName, engine, table_comment tableComment, DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') createTime from information_schema.tables where table_schema = (select database()) order by create_time desc

select column_name columnName, data_type dataType, column_comment columnComment, column_key columnKey from information_schema.columns where table_name = #{name} and table_schema = (select database()) order by ordinal_position
